attributes.action: take decisive and immediate action following the BBC's report into illegal immigrant activity in Southall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should act immediately upon information revealed in the BBC's undercover report :

http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/7505574.stm

There must be immediate action taken to stop this from happening.  How can a community consisting of hundreds of illegal immigrants go un-noticed?

Sort it out Gordon.  Please.
